onboarding_survey.messages.1.text:
Please select your language:
Sila pilih bahasa anda:

✅ Your personal information is safe and private. To read our privacy policy, visit {consent}. If you are over 16 and consent to our privacy policy, select YES.  Type "EXIT" if you do not want to participate.
onboarding_survey.confirmation.question: Are you sure you do not want to get these messages? If you do not want to receive any more messages, please press NO. If you made a mistake, please press BACK and choose another option.
onboarding_survey.stop.conditions.1.message:
If you ever decide to participate in the programme, type HELLO. 

We hope to see you again soon, and we wish you a happy and peaceful day!

onboarding_survey.messages.1.text: Great! To complete this programme, you'll need a partner in parenting. There are 2 parenting experts to choose from:
Dani is a 35 old mom of 3. She's a clinical psychologist and the first person her friends ask for help with parenting.

Chris is a 38 year old dad. He used to lose his patience and get anxious when spending time with his kids. He worked as a family physician but now coaches parents on the same strategies that helped him.
Who would you like to be your guide?

Hi! I'm @fields.avatar_name! Welcome to @fields.prog_name. I am excited to be your companion in this programme. You already know about me. Now, I would love to learn more about you. It will help me create a personalised programme just for you. Let's get started.
What is your name?
onboarding_survey.validation.conditions.1.message: This looks too long. Please enter a shorter name.

onboarding_survey.messages.1.text: It's really nice to meet you, @fields.first_user_name.
Are you a WOMAN or MAN?
What is your relationship status?
Where do you live?
What is your ethnicity?
Thanks, @fields.first_user_name. Now let's get to know your child. You might have more than one, but we're going to start by focusing on just one.
What is your child's name?
onboarding_survey.skipoption.text: Please type "N" if you prefer not to answer.
onboarding_survey.validation.conditions.1.message: This looks too long. Please enter a shorter name.

onboarding_survey.messages.1.text: Is Your Child a girl or a boy?
How many years old is Your Child?
onboarding_survey.validation.conditions.1.message:
Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
Let's try that again. How many years old is Your Child? Please enter a number between 2-7.
onboarding_survey.validation.conditions.2.message: Oops! This programme is only for parents of children ages 2-7. Let's try that again. How many years old is Your Child? Please enter a number between 2-7.
onboarding_survey.validation.conditions.3.message: Oops! This programme is only for parents of children ages 2-7. Let's try that again. How many years old is Your Child? Please enter a number between 2-7.

onboarding_survey.messages.1.text: Perfect! I've got your programme ready for you and you are all set to begin.

@fields.prog_name is easiest to use when you receive content as videos, images and text. However, your data bundle and bandwidth may not support videos. To save on data, you can opt to receive the same content with a smaller audio file or as text. How would you like to receive @fields.prog_name?

survey_defaults.value: It looks like this is not a good time. Please type 1 if you'd like to continue.
Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.

onboarding_messages.msg: Congratulations on completing your first lesson in ParentText. This video explains how this programme works and what to expect next.
